name: Konrad's Kittens
summary: Players control Konrad, who then takes care of the little ones. Each of the nine kittens has its own head and needs. The adventurous among them want to let off some steam, while others are always hungry and need to be fed. And if a kitten gets lost, it is Konrad's job to find it and bring it home safely. After an exciting and exhausting night, the kittens sleep through the day and dream of Konrad's next visit.
